speaker: DRAGON
text: That night Pepe could not fall asleep,

speaker: DRAGON
text: And didn't join the other piranhas in their sleeping heap.

speaker: DRAGON
text: Alone he floated all night long with his thoughts,

speaker: DRAGON
text: But he finally slept, he wrestled and fought.

speaker: DRAGON
text: Early in the morning, Pepe did wake,

speaker: DRAGON
text: Excited about the friends he was going to make.

speaker: DRAGON
text: With a flip of his tail and push of his fins,

speaker: DRAGON
text: He was where Lana wanted to begin.
